start_message: ◉ BLACK ROOM RADIO BOT Hey, {name}! Your personal DJ in Telegram. Three sources. One bot. TEQUILA MUSIC · FULLMOON TRIP SOUND · BLACK ROOM
help_message: Commands: /search <query> — search for a track /top — top tracks /history — your recent searches /settings — audio quality /lang — change language /help — this message In DM: just type a track name In groups: play Drake or /search Drake
search_prompt: Type a track name or artist:
no_results: Nothing found. Try a different query.
error_download: Failed to download the track. Try another one.
error_too_large: △ Track is too large. Trying lower bitrate...
error_too_large_final: Track is too long to send via Telegram.
error_too_long: Track is longer than 10 minutes — can't download.
rate_limit_cooldown: ◔ Please wait {seconds}s before the next request.
rate_limit_exceeded: ✖ Hourly limit reached (10 tracks/hour). Try Premium for unlimited.
history_empty: You haven't searched for anything yet.
session_expired: Search session expired. Please search again.
radio_tequila_offline: ▸ TEQUILA LIVE Stream coming soon. Stay tuned!
radio_fullmoon_offline: ◑ FULLMOON LIVE Stream coming soon. Stay tuned!
automix_coming_soon: ✦ AUTO MIX Crossfade mixing with BPM analysis coming soon! Version v1.3
recommend_no_history: ◈ Listen to a few tracks first — then I'll build a personal playlist for you.
premium_info: ◇ BLACK ROOM Premium Free: • 10 tracks/hour • 128-192 kbps Premium: • Unlimited • Up to 320 kbps • Priority track requests • VIP stream access
premium_active: ◇ BLACK ROOM Premium is active until {until} All features unlocked. Enjoy!
premium_soon:
★ Telegram Stars payments coming soon!

Stay tuned for updates.
settings_quality: ≡ Quality settings Current quality: {current} kbps Choose bitrate:
onboard_q1: ♪ Let's set up your profile! What music style do you like?
onboard_q3: Type up to 5 favorite artists, separated by commas: e.g. Drake, The Weeknd, Billie Eilish
onboard_done: ✓ Profile set up! I'll now recommend music tailored to you.
premium_invoice_desc: Unlimited tracks · 320 kbps · VIP stream · No ads
automix_generating:

This may take a minute.
automix_no_tracks: Not enough tracks for a mix. Listen to more music first!
automix_error: Failed to create mix. Try again later.
spotify_detected: ● Spotify link detected. Searching on YouTube...
quality_premium_only: ▣ 320 kbps is available only for Premium subscribers
